data.text: Gá Zɛnvu Wooi ná-fai laazeelizu wo ma, nii é ɠɛni ná tɔɔzeizu mɔunpa. Gi gooi mɛnini, gi ka ga ɠaazuʋɛ, gi maaɓɛ ga pagɔ, gi-yeeiti fɔɔɠu ba.
Zɔi é ga zɛnvui, é ɠulani kɛlɛma, gi ka, gá ɓɔɛzu bɛ ga zeeleiti, ɠɔoɠɔ zɛnvui ná-fai ɠa gi daazeelizu wo ma, nii é ɠɛni Ɠɛɛɠɛ ʋɔ bɛ, é ɠulani kɛlɛma gi ʋɛ.
Ungo, nii gi kaani, gi mɛni, naa ɠa gi daazeelizu wo ma, wa ɓalaagi, naa ɠa a kɛ wo ɠili gi ʋa kpɔfaamai zu, é gi yɔɠɔzu gá Ɠɛɛɠɛ ta ná-Doun Zunui Yesu Kilista.
Gá niima vaiti sɛʋɛzu, naa ɠa a kɛ gá-ɠoozunɛɛi laazeeli ga pagɔ.
Wɛlɛ niima ɠeela wooi ɠa gi mɛnini Yesu Kilista la, ta gi daazeelizu wo ma. Naa ɠa ga, GALA ka ga wozakalagi, kpidi ɠila kpalaa ge la su.
Ni ada ɠɛɛna ma, da kpɔfaamai zu da tɔun, tama de ɗa ziɛ kpidii zu, da zɛɛi wosu, de la ziɛzu ga gaamai.
Kɛlɛ ni da ziɛzu wozakalagi zu, eɠɛʋelei GALA ɓɔɠɔi la wozakalagi zu, naazu da kpɔfaamai zu de ɠilagilagi, ná-Doun Zunui Yesu ma ɲamai ɠa kotoiti pɛ gba de ʋa.
Ni da ɠɛɛna ma, koto nɔpɛ ge la de ʋa, da ɓɔɠɔ yaavazu da ɓɔɠɔi, gaama nɔpɛ ge la de ya.
Ni da laana zɔ ga ga da-ɠotoiti, toɠa ga wooɠɛɠila nu ta telebo nu, é da-ɠotoiti suvaayɛ de ʋɛ, é telebotalai pɛ gba de ʋa.
Ni da ɠɛɛna ma, de la koto ɠɛɛni, da tɔun kɛɛzu ga zɛɛ nu, daawooi la de-yiimaʋɛ.
